attributes.action: Re-Open Vape Shops as essential stores during Covid 19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Please add Vape shops to essential stores to remain open during the pandemic
attributes.background: The UK vaping industry wants the Government to keep vape stores open across the country, rather than forcing them to close. Closing vapes stores, would be a potentially counterproductive move that could place further strain on the already overstretched National Health Service.
